branchCategory.name: VXS2, Pilot Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Steam
branchCategory.description: <p> VXS 2 port solenoid valve for steam is compact and lightweight, designed to operate with no need for differential pressure. The VXS is considerably quieter than similar valves due to its special construction and full wave rectifier type solenoid. A piston main valve and special FKM material for both the valve and seal help reduce internal leakage to 1.0 cm³/min or less, and improve life cycle and valve reliability. The VXS valve series is RoHS compliant and meets IP65 enclosure guidelines.</p>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL><LI>For use with steam <LI>Long service life: 3 million cycles <LI>Double guide rings to improve air filtration <LI>Reduced power consumption compared to previous version <LI>Port size 1/4 to 1 inch <LI>IP65 Enclosure</LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: VXS2, Pilot Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Steam
